Aug. 2, 2014 D National Eisteddfod of Wales (Fourth Section)
National Eisteddfod of Wales (Fourth Section) 40 Entertainments Contest National Eisteddfod of Wales national-eisteddfod-wales-fourth-section
Festival Fields, Millennium Coastal Park, Llanelli, Carmarthenshire Own choice for no longer than 15 minutes and with a minimum of three items.
